statements: SELECT * FROM public_transport_usage;
SELECT user_id, fare FROM public_transport_usage WHERE distance_traveled > 10;
SELECT user_id, route_id, date FROM public_transport_usage WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, fare, distance_traveled FROM public_transport_usage WHERE fare < 20;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_usage ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_usage WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, route_id, fare FROM public_transport_usage WHERE distance_traveled > 10 ORDER BY fare ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS trips_taken FROM public_transport_usage GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT AVG(fare) AS avg_fare, MAX(fare) AS max_fare FROM public_transport_usage WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, SUM(fare) AS total_spent FROM public_transport_usage GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_data
SELECT id, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_data WHERE distance_km > 10
SELECT user_id, vehicle_id, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_data WHERE travel_time_min < 30
SELECT * FROM vehicle_details WHERE year < 2010 ORDER BY manufacturer ASC
SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_vehicles FROM vehicle_details GROUP BY vehicle_type
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_data WHERE distance_km > 10 ORDER BY travel_time_min DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, AVG(distance_km) as avg_distance FROM public_transportation_data GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) as num_trips FROM vehicle_details JOIN public_transportation_data ON vehicle_details.vehicle_id = public_transportation_data.vehicle_id GROUP BY vehicle_type ORDER BY num_trips DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM public_transportation_data WHERE start_location LIKE 'New%' AND end_location LIKE '%City';
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) as vehicle_count FROM vehicle_details GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING vehicle_count > 2 ORDER BY vehicle_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_system ORDER BY city_name DESC;
SELECT id, city_name, transportation_type FROM public_transportation_system WHERE carbon_emission < 5;
SELECT city_name, transportation_type, carbon_emission FROM public_transportation_system WHERE transportation_type = 'Bus';
SELECT * FROM transportation_logs WHERE distance_traveled > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_system ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC;
SELECT city_name, transportation_type, carbon_emission FROM public_transportation_system WHERE transportation_type = 'Train';
SELECT city_name, carbon_emission FROM public_transportation_system WHERE carbon_emission > 50 ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, distance_traveled FROM transportation_logs WHERE distance_traveled < 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY username;
SELECT * FROM Transportation_Stations;
SELECT station_name, city FROM Transportation_Stations ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT route_name, route_type, start_station_id, end_station_id FROM Transportation_Routes WHERE route_type = 'Bus';
SELECT passenger_name, ticket_price FROM Transportation_Tickets WHERE purchase_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT route_id, passengers_count, carbon_emission FROM Transportation_Analytics ORDER BY passengers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transportation_Stations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT station_name, city FROM Transportation_Stations WHERE latitude >= 40.7 ORDER BY longitude DESC;

SELECT station_name, route_name, ticket_price FROM Transportation_Stations JOIN Transportation_Routes ON Transportation_Stations.station_id = Transportation_Routes.start_station_id WHERE route_type = 'Bus' AND ticket_price < 20 ORDER BY ticket_price;
SELECT passenger_name, purchase_date FROM Transportation_Tickets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT route_name, passengers_count, carbon_emission FROM Transportation_Routes JOIN Transportation_Analytics ON Transportation_Routes.route_id = Transportation_Analytics.route_id WHERE passengers_count > 1000 ORDER BY carbon_emission ASC;
SELECT * FROM route;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM route WHERE route_type = 'Local';
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM stop ORDER BY stop_name ASC;
SELECT trip_date, route_id, stop_id FROM trip WHERE trip_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, passenger_name, passenger_email FROM passenger WHERE passenger_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM route WHERE route_type = 'Express'
SELECT route_name, route_type FROM route ORDER BY route_name ASC
SELECT trip_id, trip_date FROM trip WHERE trip_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT fare_amount FROM fare WHERE route_id = 3 ORDER BY fare_amount DESC
SELECT passenger_name, passenger_email FROM passenger
